baseRule.text: 若復苾芻尼於家慳者。波逸底迦。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 133

partialParallels.text: Yā pana bhikkhunī kulamaccharinī assa, pācittiyaṁ.
partialParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 55

translations.text: Welche Nonne aber in bezug auf Familien eigennützig ist, muß dafür sühnen.
Should any bhikkhuni be stingy with regard to families (supporters), it is to be confessed.
Jika ada Bhikkhuni yang kikir dengan sehubungan kepada keluarga (penyokong), itu harus di akui.

partialParallels.text: 「若比丘尼，於家生嫉妬心，波逸提。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 149

partialParallels.text: 若比丘尼護惜他家。波逸提。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 89

partialParallels.text: 若比丘尼護惜他家。波夜提。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 156

partialParallels.text: 若比丘尼。慳嫉心護他家者波夜提(九十事竟)。
partialParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 90
